name: DISSOLVE_BRAVE
description: Your courage and determination propagated to future generations of Monsters when you Dissolved into the Spawning Vat. Your descendants will be brave.

name: DISSOLVE_CLEVER
description: Your wit and wisdom dissolved into the Spawning Vat along with your body. Future Monsters will be just a little more clever.

name: DISSOLVE_FIERCE
description: Your life was filled with blood and struggle. You have left a legacy of ferocity to future Monsters.

name: DISSOLVE_HONESTY
description: Your spirit was strong and you spoke the honest truth. Your memory will lives on in the minds of other Monsters and in future issue of the Spawning Vat.

name: DISSOLVE_KIND
description: You sacrificed willingly, right up to the end of your life. Now your kindness is paid forward to the next generation of Monsters born from the Spawning Vat.

name: DISSOLVE_MEDIOCRITY
description: You lived an average life for a Monster, dissolving into the Spawning Vat with quiet dignity, doing your part for future generations.

name: LEGEND_OF_DEPARTURE
description: Future generations will speak of you -- a Monster who chose to break with tradition and forge a new life outside of Monster society.

name: NEUROSURGERY
description: Your strange road ended in a Human town, where you pretended to be one of them. You are a brilliant and respect doctor but you can never remove your mask.

name: DESTRUCTION_OF_HUMANS
description: You took the lead and the other Monsters followed. By your command, they slaughtered every Human. Now Monsters rule the world entire.

name: MONSTER_ANNIHILATION
description: Your fellow Monsters might whine and howl at the injustice of their loss, but they are all dead. That must be the wind... or ghosts.

name: STALEMATE
description: You saw the peace of ages burn to a pile of ash. From the ashes rose two armies, Human and Monster, who will fight forever. This is your legacy.

name: COMBINED_PROSPERITY
description: You dared to find the narrow gap between fear and hate. Now Humans and Monsters work together for the benefit of all.

name: SECOND_CLASS_MONSTER
description: You tried to stop it but the other Monsters were too foolish to listen. Now they wear collars and serve Humans as pets and beasts of burden.

name: SUCCESSFUL_FLEEING
description: You led the Monsters away when the Humans came. The Humans will never find you. You can start over and live in peace.
